00006 /*
00007  * MEM_ALLOC
00008  *
00009  * Wrapper over MEM_ALLOC_N. Equivalent to allocating
00010  * memory for 1 entry of type /type/.
00011  */
00012 #define MEM_ALLOC(type) (MEM_ALLOC_N(type, 1))
00013 
00014 /*
00015  * MEM_ALLOC_N
00016  *
00017  * Allocates memory for /numelem/ elements of type /type/.
00018  */

00021 /*
00022  * __memAllocate
00023  *
00024  * This function should not be called directly. It's a wrapper
00025  * over calloc.
00026  * If memory can't be properly allocated, it displays an error
00027  * message and exits the program.
00028  */
